---
title: MyTodo
description: MyTodo
tabs: ['English', 'Deutsch', 'Espanol']
keywords: 'todo,edge,lab'
date: 19 April 2021
---

<PageDescription>

In this section you will apply what you have learned in the previous section about IBM Edge Application Manager (IEAM).

</PageDescription>

## Task

Now that you have learned the basic functions of the Edge Manager and done the corresponding exercises, here is a short task for you.

There is an Edge Management Service called "MyToDo" and there is also an EdgeManagement Pattern called "MyToDo".

Take a look at the exercises you have done and install the MyToDo services via a simple "CLI Register" and then via a "Policy".

Good luck

<PageDescription>

In this section you will apply what you have learned in the previous section about IBM Edge Application Manager (IEAM).

</PageDescription>

## Task

Now that you have learned the basic functions of the Edge Manager and done the corresponding exercises, here is a short task for you.

There is an Edge Management Service called "MyToDo" and there is also an EdgeManagement Pattern called "MyToDo".

Take a look at the exercises you have done and install the MyToDo services via a simple "CLI Register" and then via a "Policy".

Good luck
